content.rendered: Santosh George is a specialist QHSE consultant and auditor with extensive risk analysis experience covering shipyards and offshore assets together with implementation of Group Management systems and ISO accreditations. Mr. George is based in Dubai, UAE.

excerpt.rendered: Specialist QHSE consultant and auditor with extensive risk analysis experience covering shipyards and offshore assets.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dr George Mowatt | Technical Director (Expert Witness)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: London | +44 (0) 7836 278 238Discipline: Naval Architecture BSC. Structural Engineering PhD. C.Eng.Specialism: International operations; Class and Statutory Requirements; Design Defects; Design - Ship Design; Offshore platform Design and Construction; Subsea Structure; Fatigue Assessment; Finite Element Analysis; Loadout Analysis; Transportation & Installation; Heavy Lift; Risk Assessment; Contract / Construction…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dr Bader Diab PhD  |  Regional MD Americas | Country Manager USA
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Houston | +1 832-483-7775Discipline: Structural Mechanics BSc, Masters, PhD. PEng.Specialism: Design - Offshore platforms; Fatigue Analysis; Finite Element Analysis; Fire and Explosion; Float-over; Lifting Analysis; Loadout Analysis; Noise and Vibration; Transportation & Installation; Ports, Berths and Harbors; Sea Fastening and Mooring analysis; Vessel Structural Strength; Expert Evidence, Arbitration & Litigation…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Reuben Segal  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Over 20 years' experience in the offshore and shipping sectors covering both engineering design and ship surveying.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Risk Management
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has extensive experience in risk identification and marine risk management in concept development, detailed design, engineering, temporary phases and operations of both oil & gas offshore assets and the renewable energy sector.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Consultancy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar provide professional offshore & marine consultancy services. Our team of Master Mariners and Naval Architects has extensive experience of a wide range of activities from simple marine operations to challenging and complex offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Steven Lee | Director, Offshore Technical Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Tyne & Wear | +44 (0)7834 593 095Discipline: EngineerSpecialism: Specialising in casualty and accident investigation of Offshore Vessels and Drilling Rigs, specifically in the areas of Dynamic Positioning, Power Management, Marine Systems, Drilling Systems, Well Control Systems and Jacking Systems.Expert Witness Expertise: Written expert opinion, witness of fact
